# MetaTransformFunction delegate

```csharp
public delegate bool MetaTransformFunction(IntPtr transbuf, IntPtr meta, IntPtr buffer, uint type, 
    IntPtr data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| transbuf | Transfer ownership: none |
| meta | Transfer ownership: none |
| buffer | Transfer ownership: none |
| type | Transfer ownership: none |
| data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
